arts.ttl: Guardiola issues Haaland, Rodri, Khusanov, Ait-Nouri injury update before Swansea trip
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola provides the latest update on the fitness of his Manchester City squad ahead of Wednesday nightâ€™s EFL Cup fourth-round clash with Swansea City.

Swansea come into the tie on the back of their first win in nearly a month, a 2-1 victory over Norwich that lifted them to 13th in the Championship, and they will take confidence from a strong EFL Cup...
